text: The men's 4 x 400 metres relay event at the 2007 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Debrecen, Hungary, at Gyulai István Atlétikai Stadion on 14 and 15 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Maksim Dyldin Denis Alekseyev Artem Sergeyenkov Anton Kokorin ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Grzegorz Klimczyk Patryk Baranowski Piotr Dąbrowski Kacper Kozłowski ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Jonas Plass Florian Schwalm Matthias Bos Martin Grothkopp ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 15 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! Nation !! Competitors !! Time !! Notes |- | || align=left | || align=left| Maksim Dyldin Denis Alekseyev Artem Sergeyenkov Anton Kokorin || 3:02.13 || CR |- | || align=left | || align=left| Grzegorz Klimczyk Patryk Baranowski Piotr Dąbrowski Kacper Kozłowski || 3:04.76 || |- | || align=left | || align=left| Jonas Plass Florian Schwalm Matthias Bos Martin Grothkopp || 3:05.25 || |- | 4 || align=left | || align=left| Marek Hrubý Pavel Jiráň Theodor Jareš Petr Klofáč || 3:05.71 || |- | 5 || align=left | || align=left| Jeffrey Lawal- Balogun Richard Hill Ben Carne Richard Buck || 3:07.06 || |- | 6 || align=left | || align=left| Miklós Szebeny Dávid Takács László Bartha Balázs Molnár || 3:07.08 || |- | 7 || align=left | || align=left| Aitor Martín Mark Ujakpor Mohamed Amin Hamdoum Diego Gómez || 3:08.63 || |- | 8 || align=left | || align=left| Constantin Țucă Stefan Pavel Dan Dancianu Vasile Boboș || 3:09.18 || |} ===Heats=== 14 July Qualified: first 2 in each heat and 4 best to the Final ====Heat 1==== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
